title: How to to talk to spirit directly - Quora

response.answer_text: You shouldn't be focusing on your spirit you should be focusing on your life. If you want to know the state of your heart then let yourself feel and watch how you feel. If you want to know the state of your mind than you should focus on that as well. Learn how you think and believe by seeing how you interact with other people. There is no need to deal with the spirit instead choose how you want to be and become it. Choose the life you want and gain it. That is all you have to do for each person possesses infinite opportunities and the ability to accomplish their dreams.
